thread.title: Charges advance against Flint man accused of drive-by stop light slaying
thread.title_full: Charges advance against Flint man accused of drive-by stop light slaying

author: Oona Goodin-Smith | ogoodins@mlive.com
title: Charges advance against Flint man accused of drive-by stop light slaying
text: A judge has ruled that first-degree premeditated homicide charges against a Flint man accused of a fatal drive-by shooting - which caused his victim to crash into an electrical pole before bleeding to death - will move forward in Genesee Circuit Court.
